
                            
                            <p>没升级前，关闭了视频彩铃，拨打电话等待不会出现垃圾广告视频，升级后，设置没改，视频彩铃又如狗皮膏药出现了。搜索了一下，部分网友反馈去和移动、联通、电信沟通。<img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/20/164443v3ai4eerv1i6vra4.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/20/164443v3ai4eerv1i6vra4.jpg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/20/164449vm34nml5ntc4nhm3.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/20/164449vm34nml5ntc4nhm3.jpg"> <br> </p><p class="pl">2.0的bug很多 尤其是来去电界面&nbsp;&nbsp;我天天打电话投诉 <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/default/lol.gif" alt="有没升级了小米手机澎湃2.0系统的，视频彩铃关不掉了 - 0818团" title="有没升级了小米手机澎湃2.0系统的，视频彩铃关不掉了 - 0818团"></p><p></p>
